nodes.text: Trammel's Move is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Dorumaa's Children. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on December 4, 2003 and took the form of a monologue by Blackie, a street person from Tolea Biqua. Blackie discussed Rufus Trammel and his upcoming move away from the Cularin system and the implications this may have for the underworld there.
